content: समृद्धिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Great growth, increase, thriving; मधुसमृद्धिसमेधितमेधवा <ls>Śi. 6. 20.</ls> {@--2@} Prosperity, opulence, affluence; <ls>Pt. 1. 169</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 42.</ls> {@--3@} Wealth, riches. {@--4@} Exuberance, profusion, abundance; as in धनधान्यसमृद्धिरस्तु. {@--5@} Power, supremacy.
